PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-10592020-12-14,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Small Vessel Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SMALL VESSEL REGULATIONS in order to remove the requirement that the signature of a Declaration of Conformity (DOC) be witnessed by a person authorized to administer oaths, allowing the DOC to be completed and sent electronically.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0279 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Small Vessel Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SMALL VESSEL REGULATIONS in order to remove the requirement that the signature of a Declaration of Conformity (DOC) be witnessed by a person authorized to administer oaths, allowing the DOC to be completed and sent electronically.
